text: Anabel G贸mez L贸pez is a Mexican seller who sold meat tamales outside the Indios Verdes metro station. With an average daily flow of people at her stand, one day, short of money and finding a lost girl on the street, she took her home and murdered her, using her meat as the filling for her tamales, which began to generate praise among her customers and great success for her business. ==References== ==Other websites== * at Yaotube Category:Living people Category:1957 births Category:Prisoners Category:People from Mexico City
